com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl

Class HttpFileTransferImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl.HttpFileTransferImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileTransfer

    public class HttpFileTransferImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileTransfer
    An implementation of the FileTransferService interface in which the remote locations are available via http[s].
    Since:
    3.0.0
